author: fmeschbe
msg: SLING-1193 Add useful methods to the Resource interface
- Add AbstractResource abstract class with implementations of new methods
- Move AdapterManager field from SyntheticResource to AbstractResource
- Adapt JCR Resource support to new API and test cases
- Fix Testcase in Engine bundle to extend MockResource from AbstractResource

author: scheu
msg: Quick fix to avoid toString when not monitoring

author: rding
msg: PIG-1500: guava.jar should be removed from the lib folder

author: tross
msg: Made the new C++ API more friendly for swig-wrapping.
- Added Message::setProperty() as an alternative to using getProperties() to obtain
a writable reference to a Variant::Map.
- Added unit testing for this new method.
- Added #ifndef SWIG conditions around the declarations of non-member operator<< methods.

author: dsavage
msg: Created new Resource concept to encode BND concepts foo, foo=foo, {foo=foo}, @foo (FELIX-1814)
